Reading, doing and writing
A flipped classroom is structured around the idea that lecture or direct instruction is not the best use of class time. Instead students encounter information before class, freeing class time for activities that involve higher order thinking

title: 2020771 - SEMINARIO 2
text:
üìë Course Brief
Focus: the focus of this course is to gain knowledge on research methods and scientific writing. This academic activity aims to strengthen students‚Äô abilities to document & communicate their geospatial research results.
How: reading, learning by doing and writing


üéØ Learning Objectives

Appraise the research processes used to build up science
Understand the principles of experimental research
Get to know how to conduct a literature review
Learn to write a scientific report
